name: Goal Tracker | Free Notion Template
description: Goals don’t need to be complicated.The Simple Goals template makes setting, tracking and achieving goals effortless, in one easy-to-use dashboard.How does it work? Set goals, and assign a timeframe Define metrics to track your progress That’s it.We often overcomplicate goal-setting, before we’ve even decided what goals are highest priority.Here's a walkthrough of how it works:
features: Set goals, and assign a timeframe; Define metrics to track your progress
